issue_priorities.name: Lowest
issue_priorities.description: A trivial problem with little or no impact on the project.

issue_priorities.name: Low
issue_priorities.description: A minor problem with low impact on the project, or easily worked around.

issue_priorities.name: Medium
issue_priorities.description: A problem that has potential to inflict noticeable impact on the project, but is not critical.

issue_priorities.name: High
issue_priorities.description: A serious problem that could block progress on the project.

issue_priorities.name: Highest
issue_priorities.description: A critical problem that will block progress on the project.
